text: Lumiar () is a freguesia (civil parish) and district of Lisbon, the capital of Portugal. ==Landmarks== There interesting places in the neighbourhood. * Alvalade Stadium (home of Sporting Lisbon) * National Museum of Costume * Col√©gio de Santa Doroteia * Monteiro-Mor Park * National Theatre and Dance Museum == Transportation == === Metro === People can travel to the parish with these Lisbon Metro lines and stations: * Green Line ** Telheiras ** Campo Grande * Yellow Line ** Lumiar ** Quinta das Conchas ** Campo Grande ==Other websites== Category:Lisbon
title: Lumiar
